name: Astronut
description:
In this two-player game, you are either a squirrel or an alien, and you must race each other to a diamond planet. Jump from planet to planet through space and use gravity to help you get to the finish line first.

This game was made in under 33 hours for the "GameDev Society UFRGS" winter Game Jam with the theme "Falling".

Programmers:

  • Marcelo Vasques
  • Khin Baptista

3D Models:

  • Diego Velasco Volkmann
  • Margareth Levy
